hero.name: Mohammad Nour Aldeen
hero.title: Web Applications and Websites Developer
hero.subtitle: I develop responsive, interactive, and multilingual websites powered by modern web technologies.

description.p1: I’m Mohammed Nour Aldeen, a Web and Applications Developer currently working as a React & WordPress Developer at Sawa Tech. I have experience delivering tailored digital solutions for clients in the UAE and Qatar, with a strong focus on technical performance and user experience.
description.p2: I specialize in building modern web applications using React.js and Next.js, designing responsive and engaging user interfaces with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion, and developing as well as managing websites with WordPress.
description.p3: My goal is to provide reliable, high-quality software solutions that align with industry best practices and create real value for both users and businesses.

justice-legal-portfolio.title: Justice Legal Services Website
justice-legal-portfolio.description: A bilingual responsive website for a law firm, showcasing legal services and expertise with a professional design and full SEO optimization.
justice-legal-portfolio.fullDescription: The Justice Legal Services website is a professional portfolio built to represent a trusted law firm. It features bilingual content (Arabic/English) covering information about the firm, legal practice areas, team members, and consultation booking. The design is clean, modern, and fully responsive, with a strong focus on user experience (UX) and search engine optimization (SEO). It is developed using React and Tailwind CSS, with RTL/LTR layout support powered by i18next. The site structure includes semantic HTML, meta tags, structured data, sitemap, and robots.txt to ensure optimal SEO performance in both languages.

features.feature1: Bilingual interface (Arabic and English) with RTL and LTR support
features.feature2: Professional presentation of legal services and specialties
features.feature3: Consultation booking and contact form via email or WhatsApp
features.feature4: Fully responsive layout across all devices
features.feature5: SEO-friendly structure with meta tags and structured data
features.feature6: Elegant UI with a color scheme that reflects trust and professionalism

challenges.challenge1: Designing a visually balanced RTL/LTR interface
challenges.challenge2: Presenting legal services clearly without overwhelming the user
challenges.challenge3: Integrating contact form with external platforms (email & WhatsApp)
challenges.challenge4: Ensuring effective SEO for a multilingual environment

al-baheej.title: Al-Baheej Center Website
al-baheej.description: A bilingual, responsive website for Al-Baheej Educational & Psychological Training Center, designed to facilitate consultation booking and showcase programs.
al-baheej.fullDescription: The Al-Baheej Center website is a modern, fully responsive platform built for a psychological and educational training center led by consultant Noor Rayhan. The site is designed to help users book consultations via WhatsApp, explore a variety of training programs, watch podcast episodes, and read testimonials. It supports both Arabic and English through i18n, and features SEO optimization, accessibility considerations, and a calming visual design tailored for user trust and ease of navigation. The site is optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop experiences, ensuring a smooth user journey across all devices.

features.feature1: Consultation booking via WhatsApp with pre-filled messages
features.feature4: Dedicated pages for programs, testimonials, FAQs, podcasts, and about
features.feature5: SEO-optimized meta tags and Open Graph data for social sharing
features.feature6: Responsive design compatible with all screen sizes

challenges.challenge1: Designing a bilingual layout with RTL and LTR support
challenges.challenge2: Maintaining clarity and simplicity while presenting multiple programs
challenges.challenge3: Ensuring consistent styling and layout across different content types
challenges.challenge4: Optimizing SEO and structured data for visibility in Arabic search queries

al-aswad-real-estate.title: Al-Aswad Real Estate Website
al-aswad-real-estate.description: A bilingual, responsive real estate website that showcases properties for sale and rent with advanced filtering and detailed listings.
al-aswad-real-estate.fullDescription: The Al-Aswad Real Estate website is a modern, fully responsive platform designed to display residential and commercial properties in a clean and user-friendly layout. The site features advanced property filtering (by type, price, location, and features), interactive property details pages with media galleries and Google Maps, and informative sections such as services, blog, and contact. Built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, the platform supports Arabic and English using i18n and is SEO-optimized with semantic HTML, meta tags, sitemap, and robots.txt. The design features an Arabic-inspired palette that enhances trust and cultural familiarity.

features.feature2: Advanced search and filtering of properties
features.feature3: Responsive design adaptable to all screen sizes
features.feature4: Detailed property pages with images, specs, and maps
features.feature5: SEO-friendly structure with meta tags, sitemap, and robots.txt
features.feature6: Arabic-themed design with traditional color palette

challenges.challenge1: Designing a seamless multilingual interface with RTL support
challenges.challenge2: Balancing aesthetics with usability in property filtering
challenges.challenge3: Structuring reusable components across multiple pages
challenges.challenge4: Ensuring SEO compatibility for both Arabic and English content

ravora.title: REVORA Website for Automotive Oils and Accessories
ravora.description: A multilingual website for a brand specialized in engine oil manufacturing, featuring a professional design and full SEO optimization.
ravora.fullDescription: The REVORA website is a modern, fully responsive platform designed to showcase the products of a company specializing in automotive oils and related accessories. It includes dedicated pages for Home, Products, and About Us, and supports four languages: English, German, Spanish, and Arabic using the i18n library. The website offers a complete user experience with a clean, accessible design that adapts to different text directions and languages. Products are displayed in a well-organized layout that simplifies exploration and browsing for users.

features.feature1: Full support for four languages (Arabic, English, German, Spanish) using i18n
features.feature2: Fully responsive design for all screen sizes and devices
features.feature3: Organized product display with images and detailed information
features.feature4: Smooth language switcher with RTL support for Arabic
features.feature5: Clear page structure including Home, Products, and About Us

challenges.challenge1: Implementing multilingual support while maintaining usability and clean layout
challenges.challenge2: Structuring and presenting product categories in an appealing and efficient way
challenges.challenge3: Ensuring full compatibility with RTL layout for Arabic content

home-fix.title: Home Fix UAE Website
home-fix.description: A multilingual company profile website for a home maintenance company named Home Fix UAE, featuring responsive design and trust-oriented UI with SEO support.
home-fix.fullDescription: This project is a professional company profile website built for a fictional home maintenance service company called 'Home Fix UAE'. The website is fully responsive and supports four languages: Arabic, English, Hindi, and Urdu — catering to the diverse audience in the UAE. It includes core pages such as Home, Services, Gallery, About Us, Contact, and an optional Pricing page. Built using React and Tailwind CSS, the site is optimized for search engines (SEO) and user experience (UX), featuring a clean layout and a trustworthy color scheme based on dark blue and orange. The project demonstrates strong capability in building real-world business-ready websites, with potential for future scalability.

features.feature1: Supports four languages (Arabic, English, Hindi, Urdu) with RTL and LTR compatibility
features.feature2: Fully responsive layout across all screen sizes
features.feature3: SEO optimized using meta tags, sitemap, and structured data
features.feature4: Clear core pages including Services, Gallery, Contact, and About Us
features.feature5: Clean and professional UI with a trust-focused color scheme

challenges.challenge1: Implementing full RTL support without breaking the layout
challenges.challenge2: Maintaining visual consistency across four language interfaces
challenges.challenge3: Ensuring high performance and SEO optimization in a multilingual setup
challenges.challenge4: Designing a modern, business-ready UI without unnecessary complexity

part-time.title: Part-Time Platform
part-time.description: A responsive job platform connecting university students with flexible, part-time opportunities.
part-time.fullDescription: Part-Time is a web platform designed to bridge the gap between university students and the job market by offering flexible work opportunities tailored to student life. The platform allows students to create profiles, browse jobs by category and location, and apply with ease. Companies can post job openings, manage applications, and discover talented young professionals. With a user-friendly design and clear user flows for both students and employers, the platform aims to support career growth while maintaining academic commitments. The project was built with scalability and multilingual support in mind to serve a broad range of users.

features.feature1: Separate dashboards for students and companies
features.feature2: Student profile management with academic and skill details
features.feature3: Job browsing and filtering by location, type, and field
features.feature4: Job posting and applicant management for companies

challenges.challenge1: Designing an intuitive UX for two distinct user types (students and companies)
challenges.challenge2: Implementing dynamic filtering and search for job listings
challenges.challenge3: Ensuring scalability for future features like notifications and real-time updates
